entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 34 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 55 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 51 in the morning and minus 41 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
